# <a name="ca2362-unsafe-dataset-or-datatable-in-autogenerated-serializable-type-can-be-vulnerable-to-remote-code-execution-attacks"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-103">CA2362：自動產生之可序列化型別中不安全的 DataSet 或 DataTable，容易受到遠端程式碼執行攻擊</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-103">CA2362: Unsafe DataSet or DataTable in autogenerated serializable type can be vulnerable to remote code execution attacks</span></span>

| | <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-104">值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-104">Value</span></span> |
|-|-|
| <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-105">**規則識別碼**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-105">**Rule ID**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-106">CA2362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-106">CA2362</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-107">**類別**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-107">**Category**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-108">Microsoft.Security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-108">Microsoft.Security</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-109">**修正程式中斷或未中斷**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-109">**Fix is breaking or non-breaking**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-110">非中斷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-110">Non-breaking</span></span>|

## <a name="cause"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-111">原因</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-111">Cause</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-112">標記為的類別或結構 <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> 包含 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 或 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 欄位或屬性，而且具有 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-112">A class or struct marked with <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> contains a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> field or property, and does have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute>.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-113">[CA2352](ca2352.md) 是一種類似的規則，如果沒有，則為 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-113">[CA2352](ca2352.md) is a similar rule, for when there isn't a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute>.</span></span>

## <a name="rule-description"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-114">規則描述</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-114">Rule description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-115">當還原序列化未受信任的輸入，而且還原序列化 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> 的物件圖形包含 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 或時 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> ，攻擊者可以製作惡意的內容來執行遠端程式碼執行攻擊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-115">When deserializing untrusted input with <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> and the deserialized object graph contains a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, an attacker can craft a malicious payload to perform a remote code execution attack.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-116">這項規則就像是 [CA2352](ca2352.md)，但適用于 GUI 應用程式內資料的記憶體內部表示的自動產生程式碼。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-116">This rule is like [CA2352](ca2352.md), but for autogenerated code for an in-memory representation of data within a GUI application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-117">通常，這些自動產生的類別不會從不受信任的輸入還原序列化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-117">Usually, these autogenerated classes aren't deserialized from untrusted input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-118">您應用程式的使用方式可能會有所不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-118">Your application's usage may vary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-119">此規則會尋找還原序列化時不安全的類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-119">This rule finds types which are insecure when deserialized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-120">如果您的程式碼未將找到的類型還原序列化，則表示您沒有還原序列化的弱點。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-120">If your code doesn't deserialize the types found, then you don't have a deserialization vulnerability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-121">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料集和 DataTable 安全性指引](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2132227)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-121">For more information, see [DataSet and DataTable security guidance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2132227).</span></span>

## <a name="how-to-fix-violations"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-122">如何修正違規</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-122">How to fix violations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-123">可能的話，請使用 [Entity Framework](/ef/) 而不是 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 和 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-123">If possible, use [Entity Framework](/ef/) rather than <xref:System.Data.DataSet> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-124">使序列化的資料無法進行篡改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-124">Make the serialized data tamper-proof.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-125">在序列化之後，以密碼編譯方式簽署序列化的資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-125">After serialization, cryptographically sign the serialized data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-126">在還原序列化之前，請先驗證密碼編譯簽章。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-126">Before deserialization, validate the cryptographic signature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-127">保護密碼編譯金鑰免于洩漏和設計金鑰輪替。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-127">Protect the cryptographic key from being disclosed and design for key rotations.</span></span>

## <a name="when-to-suppress-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-128">隱藏警告的時機</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-128">When to suppress warnings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-129">您可以放心地隱藏此規則的警告 i：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-129">It's safe to suppress a warning from this rule i:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-130">此規則所找到的類型永遠不會以直接或間接方式還原序列化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-130">The type found by this rule is never deserialized, either directly or indirectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-131">您知道輸入是受信任的。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-131">You know the input is trusted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-132">請考慮您的應用程式信任界限和資料流程可能會隨著時間而改變。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-132">Consider that your application's trust boundary and data flows may change over time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-133">您已採取 [如何修正違規](#how-to-fix-violations)的其中一項預防措施。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-133">You've taken one of the precautions in [How to fix violations](#how-to-fix-violations).</span></span>

## <a name="pseudo-code-examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-134">虛擬程式碼範例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-134">Pseudo-code examples</span></span>

### <a name="violation"></a><span data-ttu-id="cbd8e-135">違規</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cbd8e-135">Violation</span></span>

```csharp
using System.Data;
using System.Xml.Serialization;

namespace ExampleNamespace
{
    [global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCode(""System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator"", ""2.0.0.0"")]
    [global::System.Serializable()]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute(""code"")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(true)]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaProviderAttribute(""GetTypedDataSetSchema"")]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute(""Package"")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute(""vs.data.DataSet"")]
    public class ExampleClass : global::System.Data.DataSet {
        private DataTable table;
    }
}
```
